short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Google Chrome extension groups tabs automatically. Groups are based on tabs domain names.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you organize tabs into groups. Groups appear automatically and are based on tab domains, however you still able to manage tabs and groups manually and the extension tries to mimic your logic. You can put tabs with different domains into one group and extension will do it automatically further. The extension suggests short and understandable names for groups. Of course, you are still able to rename groups and select color as you please.
